lyrics:
3 contributorsone more time lyricsintro
la la la la la la la
la da la la la la la la la la la la la la la
oh oh la la la la la la la la
im so lonely tonight oh oh

verse 1
if i could only hold you once more
if i could only kiss you once more
if i could only see you one more time one more time oh oh
things wouldnt be the way they are now
id make you see i loved you somehow
if i could only see you one more time

bridge
so please say youll let me see you
five minutes alone
its so hard to make you understand
talking on the phone oh oh

verse 2
id like you to know i know i was wrong
id like you to know my love is still strong
gee but id like to see you one more time mmm

outro
la la la da da da
la la la da la la la da la da da da da da
la la la la la da la la
im so lonely tonightyou might also likeembed
